Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Is the class containing all the tile information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int id,
    int row,
    int column)
        Constructs a Tile object. It requires the ID and some topological information, i.e. the row and column where the tile is located.
        Parameters:
        id - The tile ID
        row - The row
        column - The column
